ovdesc.p: This is an internal file providing an alternative alphanumeric key by which Customer records may be accessed.
Only the S(ee), P(rint) and L(ist) functions may be used in this application.

desc.p: Specifies the Customer record which may be accessed using the Mnemonic Code defined in Field 0.
Specifies the Mnemonic (alphanumeric) code which may be used as an alternative key to access the Customer record defined in Field 1.
3-10 alphanumeric (type MNE) characters Customer Mnemonic. (Internal field, no input.)
